name: Dice Constructor
description:
Roll dice and place them by matching the faces of other dice, like a game of dominoes.

Press the button on screen or R to roll the dice.

Hover over a valid position and press the middle mouse button or T to change its rotation. If it does not rotate, there may be an adjacent die that prevents other rotations.

Left click or E to place the dice.

Complete levels by fulfilling the objective stated at the top.
